## ChatEmbeddedAPI.setMetaPrompt() method

Defines the requirements for how your response must look like examples: - "Response must be less than 100 words" - "Response must be in Spanish"

**Signature:**

```typescript
setMetaPrompt(metaPrompt: string): void;
```
